description: This file defines a health check endpoint using Flask and Flask-Smorest. It creates a Blueprint named 'Health Check' with a route at '/' that responds with a simple JSON message indicating the service is healthy.

classes.name: HealthCheck
classes.description: A Flask MethodView class that implements a GET endpoint to return a health status message.

methods.name: get(self)
methods.description: Handles GET requests to the health check route, returning a JSON object with a 'Healthy' message.

ctags.name: blp
ctags.pattern: /^blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/

fields.name: blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/
